sentences.en: Beware of dishonest traders in the tourist areas.
sentences.cn: 在旅游区一定要谨防奸商。

sentences.en: Beware of people stirring up trouble behind the scenes.
Beware the sharks when you are making up your mind how to invest.
sentences.cn: 当你决定如何投资时要提防诈骗者。

sentences.en: Beware, this recipe is not for slimmers.
sentences.cn: 注意，本食谱不适用于减肥者。

sentences.en: Holidaymakers should beware of using plastic cards in foreign cash dispensers.
sentences.cn: 外出度假时，在外币取款机上使用银行卡一定要小心。

sentences.en: I think the moral of the story is let the buyer beware.
sentences.cn: 我想这个故事的寓意是提醒购物者当心。

sentences.en: Motorists have been warned to beware of icy roads.
sentences.cn: 已经提醒开车的人当心冰封的路面。

sentences.en: Motorists were warned to beware of slippery conditions.
sentences.cn: 提醒驾车人要当心路滑。

sentences.en: Parents of either sex should beware of imposing their own tastes on their children.
sentences.cn: 父母双方都应切记不要把自己的喜好强加给孩子。
警方提醒司机小心行驶。

sentences.en: Television commercials might seem more professional but beware of mistaking the gloss for the content.
sentences.cn: 电视广告看上去或许更加专业，但要当心，不要把表象误以为真。

sentences.en: You must beware of those traps — you could take all day getting out of them.
sentences.cn: 你必须当心那些陷阱——陷进去的话，要一整天才能脱身。

trans.tran_en: used to warn someone to be careful because something is dangerous
